    • showSetterGetter

      public <T> void showSetterGetter​(java.lang.Class<T> clazz)
      List object that setter, getter method and value. 
       
 code:
 Utility.get().showSetterGetter(com.chungyo.external.kind24.WagersExtend.class)

 output:
 public String getWagersID(){return mWagersID;}
 public void setWagersID(String wagersid){mWagersID=wagersid;}
 public long getRoundSerial(){return mRoundSerial;}
 public void setRoundSerial(long roundserial){mRoundSerial=roundserial;}
 public String getRoundDate(){return mRoundDate;}
 public void setRoundDate(String rounddate){mRoundDate=rounddate;}
 public String getContent(){return mContent;}
 public void setContent(String content){mContent=content;}
 public int getSerialType(){return mSerialType;}
 public void setSerialType(int serialtype){mSerialType=serialtype;}
      Type Parameters:
      T - class type
      Parameters:
      clazz - target class

    • unzip

      public void unzip​(java.lang.String zipFilePath, java.lang.String unzipFolderPath) throws java.util.zip.ZipException, java.io.IOException
      File uncompression uses ZIP.
       example: {
   String zipPath = "C:/Users/ray_lee/Desktop/toJavaModel.zip";
   String filePath = "C:/Users/ray_lee/Desktop/";

   try {
     unzip(zipPath, filePath);
   } catch (Exception e) {
     e.printStackTrace();
   }
      Parameters:
      zipFilePath -  zip source file path
      unzipFolderPath - unzip target path
      Throws:
      java.io.IOException - when read file failure
      java.util.zip.ZipException - when unzipping file failure

    • zip

      public void zip​(java.lang.String sourcePath, java.lang.String targetZipPath) throws java.io.IOException
      File compression uses ZIP.
      example: 
       // Compression file:
 Utility.get().zip("D:/myFiles/file.log", "D:/test/file.zip");
 
       // Compression directory
 Utility.get().zip("D:/myFolder", "D:/folder.zip");
      Parameters:
      sourcePath - 原始檔案(路徑可為檔案或資料夾)
      targetZipPath - 要壓縮的檔案及路徑
      Throws:
      java.io.IOException - 當開啟檔案進行壓緒時遭遇非預期失敗時將會拋出
